content:
Hey everyone, if you weren't aware the lang team had a meeting this week on building their path to membership. I think there are people here who might be interested in reading/watching the discussion.

Meeting Summary Draft: https://github.com/rust-lang/blog.rust-lang.org/blob/f841192d1219f53456aba53789e4dac42877c898/posts/inside-rust/2020-07-08-lang-team-path-to-membership.md
Recording: https://youtu.be/SeH-hZgDG1Y
